actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-91.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Ad Hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-91) Declares that the expenses, not to exceed $315,000, of special investigations and studies to be conducted by the Ad Hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Ad Hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf.
